title: Do Vision Foundation Models Enhance Domain Generalization in Medical Image Segmentation?
details: K Cekmeceli, M Himmetoglu, GI Tombak, A Susmelj… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Neural networks achieve state-of-the-art performance in many supervised learning tasks when the training data distribution matches the test data distribution. However, their performance drops significantly under domain (covariate) shift, a prevalent …
